modules.name: Animi Shamir
modules.description: Adds the Animi Shamir to Metallurgy. Items with Animi will respawn with you when you die!

modules.name: Apple Trees
modules.description: Simply Apple Trees!

modules.name: Audere Shamir
modules.description: Adds the shamir 'Audere' to metallurgy. Gain Haste with low durability tools.

modules.name: Bat Grenades
modules.description: Tired of the uselessness of bats? This module will turn them into tiny furry flying balls of boom!

modules.name: Beehive Inspector
modules.description: Inspect the number of bees in a beehive

modules.name: Better Armour Stands
modules.description: This module gives you full control over the Armour Stand's pose, size, base plate, visibility, gravity, and more.. It's also expandable!

modules.name: Better Fire
modules.description: Flame arrows set fire when they land and burning creepers explode!

modules.name: Block Compressors
modules.description: Compress stacks of blocks down for compact storage, or decompress them again.

modules.name: Book Binders
modules.description: Start printing your own Enchanted Books

modules.name: Boots of Ostara
modules.description: Plant crops and more, just by walking! Also negates Desire Lines.

modules.name: Cement Mixers
modules.description: Adds the ability to turn powder into concrete in Liquid Tanks

modules.name: Chairs
modules.description: Place a saddle on a stair to have a chair to sit on!

modules.name: Chest Boats
modules.description: A chest inside of a boat!

modules.name: Cooler Caves
modules.description: A custom terrain expansion pack that makes biome specific caves and mineshafts

modules.name: Cozy Campfires
modules.description: Heartwarming campfire evenings!

modules.name: Crossbow Cartridges
modules.description: Shoot more than just arrows!

modules.name: Custom Crafters
modules.description: A base module that adds a custom crafting table to the game.

modules.name: Dangerous Dungeons
modules.description: A custom terrain expansion pack that adds new types of dungeons underground.

modules.name: Desire Lines
modules.description: Creates natural looking paths through high traffic areas.

modules.name: Disassemblers
modules.description: Break apart diamond, gold and iron tools and weapons for materials

modules.name: Display Frames
modules.description: Splash item frames with invisibilty!

modules.name: Enchantment Extractors
modules.description: Collects enchantments from tools, armour and weapons.

modules.name: End Fishing
modules.description: Catch rare loot by fishing in the end void!

modules.name: Ender Hoppers
modules.description: Create special hoppers that teleport nearby items to them.

modules.name: Enderman Support Class
modules.description: This module allows Endermen to aid nearby hostiles in their fight against the player!

modules.name: Everstone
modules.description: Keep your baby mobs cute! But watch out for new mobs aging too

modules.name: Fulcio Shamir
modules.description: Adds the shamir 'Fulcio' to metallurgy. It allows you to place blocks in mid-air!

modules.name: Guidebook
modules.description: Adds a dynamic guidebook to discover the mechanics of Gamemode 4! This module is still considered experimental!

modules.name: Heart Canisters
modules.description: Pricey canisters that increase your health when carried.

modules.name: Holographic Tags
modules.description: Set up floating messages with a simple name tag!

modules.name: Iacio Shamir
modules.description: Adds the Iacio shamir that lets you throw further.

modules.name: Ink Spitting Squid
modules.description: *splort*

modules.name: Lightning in a Bottle
modules.description: Bottle and harness the power of lightning!

modules.name: Liquid Minecarts
modules.description: Allows Minecarts to move fluids between Liquid Tanks

modules.name: Liquid Tanks
modules.description: Store liquids compactly in special tanks and interact with them!

modules.name: Live Catch
modules.description: Catch live fish when fishing!

modules.name: Lumos Shamir
modules.description: Adds the shamir 'Lumos' to metallurgy. It places torches when it is dark.

modules.name: Master Crafting
modules.description: A crafting recipe pack at adds some efficient recipes to the game.

modules.name: Mending Tanks
modules.description: Your Liquid XP Tank can now repair your armor and tools!

modules.name: Metallurgy
modules.description: Custom ores and custom enchants for your tools and armour!

modules.name: Midnight Menaces
modules.description: Adds spooky menaces to Mysterious Midnights!

modules.name: Mob Conversion
modules.description: Convert cows, pigmen and witches into other mobs.

modules.name: Mysterious Midnights
modules.description: Adds spooky full moon nights!

modules.name: Note Block Interface
modules.description: Adds a neat interface to improve your musical skills!

modules.name: Orb of Ankou
modules.description: Capture mob abilities and use them as your own!

modules.name: Orbis
modules.description: A seed-specific chunk scanner that modifies your world as you explore.

modules.name: Particles Pack
modules.description: Fireflies to flames, add some pezazz to your projects!

modules.name: Percurro Shamir
modules.description: Swoosh! A shamir that allows you to swoosh past your enemies!

modules.name: Phantom Scarecrows
modules.description: Undead Scarecrow defenses!

modules.name: Pig Tractors
modules.description: Ride pigs through fields to quickly harvest and plant crops

modules.name: Podzol Rooting Soil
modules.description: Saplings self-plant on Podzol

modules.name: Poses Pack
modules.description: Allows you to apply preset poses to Armour Stands using the Better Armour Stands base module.

modules.name: Potion Liquids
modules.description: Adds the ability to store potions in Liquid Tanks

modules.name: Potion Swords
modules.description: As if getting stabbed isn't enough... support your friends, terrify your enemies, make gold great again!

modules.name: Record Crafting
modules.description: A crafting recipe pack that lets you craft all the records.

modules.name: Relocators
modules.description: Craft relocators to move your custom crafters, liquid tanks, and other machines

modules.name: SCUBA Gear
modules.description: Ease ocean exploration with craftable scuba gear!

modules.name: Shroomites
modules.description: Mooshrooms plant spore-emitting mushrooms that spread mycelium and other mushrooms around them.

modules.name: Smelteries
modules.description: Double your ore output with this multi-block structure.

modules.name: Soul Glass
modules.description: Reverse the effects of beacons with corrupting glass!

modules.name: Spawner Minecarts
modules.description: Pick up Spawners and move them with Minecarts.

modules.name: Speed Paths
modules.description: Gives you a speed effect when you walk on path blocks.

modules.name: Standard Crafting
modules.description: A crafting recipe pack that adds some nifty new recipes to the game.

modules.name: Sunken Treasure
modules.description: Digging sand underwater with a fortune tool can uncover buried surprises

modules.name: Sweethearts
modules.description: Transfer your health to another player using flowers.

modules.name: Tinkering Compressors
modules.description: Compress stacks of items into their block form with a tinker shamir, and back.

modules.name: TNT Landmines
modules.description: Craft 'em up, throw 'em down, blow 'em up!

modules.name: Tower Structures
modules.description: A custom terrain expansion pack that adds four new tower structures to the world.

modules.name: Trapped Signs
modules.description: Craft trapped signs which, when right-clicked, give off a redstone signal.

modules.name: Tunnel Bores
modules.description: Ever wondered how mineshafts came to be? This is it!

modules.name: Undead Players
modules.description: You'll find your death point faster, but you'll have to fight your corpse for your stuff back!

modules.name: Vecto Shamir
modules.description: Adds the Vecto shamir to summon a boat or minecart when in need.

modules.name: Vertical Rails
modules.description: Use ladders as vertical Minecart tracks.

modules.name: Vigere Shamir
modules.description: Adds the shamir 'Vigere' to metallurgy. It heals you when you block with a shield.

modules.name: Washing Tanks
modules.description: Die! Dye!

modules.name: Weighted Armour
modules.description: Perfect for UHCs, this module forces you to balance protection with speed.

modules.name: XP Storage
modules.description: Stand on top of an Ender Chest to store XP, stand below to retrieve it!

modules.name: Zauber Cauldrons
modules.description: Brew potions, special armour and attribute crystals in any cauldron!

modules.name: Zauber Liquids
modules.description: From cauldron-made potions to potion-filled tanks! Store your tier IV potions and wormholes in Liquid Tanks!

modules.name: Ziprails
modules.description: Automatically latch on to a tripwire to sail through the sky on a suspended line!
